hero.title: Taiwan High Performance Computing Education Association
hero.subtitle: Advancing Education and Research in High Performance Computing

about.title: About Us
about.description: The Taiwan High Performance Computing Education Association is dedicated to promoting HPC technologies and enhancing Taiwan's competitiveness in this field. We provide educational resources, organize seminars, and facilitate industry-academia collaboration.

projects.title: Key Projects
projects.callForProposalDesc: We adopt the Call for Proposal model to encourage innovative research projects
projects.exploreProjects: Explore our open research projects and platforms
